alert.note: Alert for San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 06 at 7:55PM MDT until May 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Fire Weather Zone 224, which includes the San Luis Valley, will expire at 8 pm MDT this evening... ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect for Saturday, from 10 AM to 9 PM MDT, for strong winds and low relative humidity, for Fire Weather Zones 220...221...222 and 224 through 237, which includes the Upper Arkansas River Valley, Teller County, Fremont County, the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo and Wet Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley, and all of the southeast Plains of Colorado... ...Fire Weather Watch remains in effect for Sunday morning through Sunday evening, for strong winds and low relative humidity, for Fire Weather Zones 220...221...222 and 224 through 237, which includes the Upper Arkansas River Valley, Teller County, Fremont County, the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo and Wet Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley, and all of the southeast Plains of Colorado... ...Fire Weather Watch remains in effect for Monday morning through Monday evening, for strong winds and low relative humidity, for Fire Weather Zones 220...221...222 and 224 through 237, which includes the Upper Arkansas River Valley, Teller County, Fremont County, the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo and Wet Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley, and all of the southeast Plains of Colorado... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 224... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 224. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Timing...Strongest winds will occur during the afternoon hours of Saturday, Sunday and Monday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
